mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, password, name, phone_number, nickname) values (#{email}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{nickname})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT email FROM users WHERE email = #{email})
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT nickname FROM users WHERE nickname = #{nickname})
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT phoneNumber FROM users WHERE phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber})
SELECT user_id, email, password, name, phone_number, nickname, profile_message, profile_image_path FROM users WHERE email = #{email} AND password = #{password}
SELECT user_id, email, password, name, phone_number, nickname, profile_message, profile_image_path FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId}
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId})
